Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, H. Rept. 96-383.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish the true location of a portion of northerly boundary of the Angeles National Forest, located in Los Angeles County, California, on the common line between sections 16 and 17, township 4 north, range 10 west, San Bernardino meridian, and to establish the center quarter corner of said section 16.

summary.text: Establishes the true location of a portion of the northerly boundary of the Angeles National Forest in Los Angeles County, California.

titles.title: A bill to establish the true location of a portion of northerly boundary of the Angeles National Forest, located in Los Angeles County, California, on the common line between sections 16 and 17, township 4 north, range 10 west, San Bernardino meridian, and to establish the center quarter corner of said section 16.
